Kharkiv National Medical University

Ukraine is one of the most popular countries known for quality medical education. MBBS Admission in Ukraine has never been easier, with an increasing number of universities and colleges throughout the country with the best study classrooms for the students. It offers high quality education and is equipped with highly trained instructors, attracting many local and international students from around the world. Among the top medical universities in Ukraine is Kharkiv National Medical University.

Founded in 1805 as part of Kharkiv Universityâ€™s medical faculty, Kharkiv National Medical University is one of the oldest and the top medical higher institutions in the country. It is also one of the first Medical Universities in Ukraine, and is a well-recognized and prestigious medical university in the world.

Kharkiv National Medical University is a member of the UNESCO (International Association of Universities) and listed in the World Health Organization directory of Medical Schools. It has been actively training medical specialists and medical students from all over the world. At present, it is training about seven thousand students, with over two thousand foreign citizens.
